descriptionSection.description:
The ClearCode integration for VersionOne automatically associates commit data with VersionOne workitems based on ClearCode's pipeline execution. It additionally modifies workitem status automatically upon pipeline execution in ClearCode.
 Benefits

 * Allows ClearCode users to quickly find which VersionOne workitems are deployed to a specific environment
 * Allows VersionOne users to use built-in reports t o show completed stories, fixed defects, and new defects within any given environment
 * Informs VersionOne users when to test stories by automatically changing their status
 * Allows VersionOne users to quickly find when a specific feature is fully deployed to an environment
 * Compatible with Version One Hosted and On-Premise

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
